availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, gentleman. Kentucky native. Son of Pillip Trapnall and Nancy Trapnall. Married to Rachel Ann Finnie Trapnall in Union County, Kentucky on February 7, 1856. Farmer in Mercer County, Kentucky in 1850. Gentleman in Mercer County, Kentucky in 1860. Published with list of Mercer County men nominated to serve as delegates to a convention of Union men in Louisville, Kentucky, on March 18, 1863. Owned two enslaved individuals in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
